sentences.en: A gelatin - like substance obtained from kelp and used in impression material.
sentences.cn: 一种从海藻中获得的类似凝胶的物质并且用于印模原料.

sentences.en: Analysis of FT - IR showed that gelatin contained no helix structure.
sentences.cn: 红外光谱显示,该法提取的明胶不存在螺旋结构.

sentences.en: Fish Gelatin, Glycerol , Essential oil of orange, Copper Chlorophyll.
sentences.cn: 鱼类明胶, 甘油, 香橙精华, 铜叶绿素.

sentences.en: For these reasons, agar rapidly replaced gelatin as the hardening agent of choice for bacterriological work.
sentences.cn: 由于这些原因, 琼脂很快代替了明胶,或为细菌学研究的较理想的固化剂.

sentences.en: Gelatin, froth or powder suitable greasiness, property and neutral flesh.
sentences.cn: 凝胶 、 泡沫或粉末适合油性 、 混合性及中性肌肤.

sentences.en: Gelatin, Glycerol , Essential oil of orange, Titanium dioxide, Copper Chlorophyll.
sentences.cn: 明胶, 甘油, 香橙精华, 二氧化钛, 铜叶绿素.

sentences.en: However, scientists do not believe that the new gelatin product would pose any risk.
sentences.cn: 然而，科学家们并不认为这种新的明胶产品会带来任何风险。

sentences.en: In addition , the graft copolymer have a clear IEP like gelatin does.
sentences.cn: 该接枝物仍具有较明显的等电点.

sentences.en: Most foods are simply tasteless - roast beef is like soft rubber, an orange like unfla - vored gelatin.
sentences.cn: 大部分食物变得简直毫无味道 —— 烤牛肉好比软橡胶, 桔子像未加香料的明胶.

sentences.en: Other Ingredients : Ascorbic Acid , Quercetin, Gelatin, Vegetable Magnesium Stearate, Titanium Dioxide Color.
sentences.cn: 抗坏血酸, 槲皮素, 凝胶, 植物硬脂酸镁, 二氧化钛色素.

sentences.en: Other Ingredients : Cellulose ( Plant Origin ) , Gelatin, Vegetable Magnesium Stearate, Silica.
sentences.cn: 植物纤维素, 凝胶, 植物硬脂酸镁, 二氧化硅.

sentences.en: Other Ingredients : Dicalcium Phosphate , Cellulose ( Plant Origin ), Gelatin, Silica, Vegetable Magnesium Stearate.
sentences.cn: 磷酸二钙, 植物纤维, 凝胶, 二氧化硅, 植物硬脂酸镁.

sentences.en: Other Ingredients : Gelatin, Glycerin. This product contains fish ( shark ) ingredients.
sentences.cn: 凝胶, 甘油. 本品含有鱼 ( 鲨鱼 ) 成分.

sentences.en: The absorption spectrum of the eosin - Y sensitized dichromated gelatin has been obtained.
sentences.cn: 曙红-Y敏化重铬酸盐明胶干版的吸收光谱已经测定.

sentences.en: The functions gelatin of optimized oligopeptide sweets mainly included antifatigue, anticarious function.
sentences.cn: 最佳工艺配方生产的功能性凝胶肽糖具有抗疲劳 、 防龋齿的功能.

sentences.en: The present paper reported gelatin - peach gum complex coacervation method of microencapsulated phoxim.
sentences.cn: 采用明胶 - 桃胶为囊材的复合凝聚方法使辛硫磷微胶囊化.

sentences.en: Vegans avoid eating any animal products. They don't eat any meat products, milk, cheese, eggs, honey, or gelatin.
sentences.cn: 绝对素食主义者不吃任何畜产品，不吃肉制品，牛奶，乳酪，蛋类，蜂蜜，或者是动物胶。

words.tran_cn: 去势的人或牲畜；阉割的动物；去势；太监
[有化][胶粘]明胶；动物胶；胶制品

trans.tran_en: a clear substance obtained from boiled animal bones, used for making jelly
